item.text: When any of you has a legal dispute with another, does he dare go to court before the unrighteous rather than before the saints?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> will <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>? <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> is to be <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> you <st data-num="370" class="">not competent</st> to <st data-num="2922" class="">settle</st> <st data-num="1646" class="">trivial suits</st>?

Do you <st data-num="3385" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we will <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>? <st data-num="3386" class="">Why not</st> <st data-num="982" class="">ordinary matters</st>!

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="982">ordinary</st> <st data-num="2922">lawsuits</st>, do you <st data-num="2523">appoint as judges</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1848">no standing</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>?<n id="1" />

I <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3779">this</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1791" class="">shame</st>! Is there <st data-num="3756">no</st> <st data-num="1762">one</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4680" class="">wise</st> enough to <st data-num="1252">settle disputes</st> <st data-num="3319" class="">between</st> <st data-num="80">fellow Christians</st>?<n id="1" />

<st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, does a <st data-num="80" class="">Christian</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">sue</st> a <st data-num="80" class="">Christian</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">before</st> <st data-num="571" class="">unbelievers</st>?

The fact <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">lawsuits</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> demonstrates <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> been <st data-num="2275" class="">defeated</st>. <st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> be <st data-num="91" class="">wronged</st>? <st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> be <st data-num="650" class="">cheated</st>?
But you yourselves wrong and cheat, and you do this to your brothers and sisters!
Do you not know that the unrighteous will not inherit the kingdom of God? Do not be deceived! The sexually immoral, idolaters, adulterers, passive homosexual partners, practicing homosexuals,

<st data-num="2812" class="">thieves</st>, the <st data-num="4123" class="">greedy</st>, <st data-num="3183" class="">drunkards</st>, the <st data-num="3060">verbally abusive</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="727" class="">swindlers</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2816" class="">inherit</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
Some of you once lived this way. But you were washed, you were sanctified, you were justified in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ and by the Spirit of our God.
“All things are lawful for me”—but not everything is beneficial. “All things are lawful for me”—but I will not be controlled by anything.

“<st data-num="1033" class="">Food</st> is for <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2836" class="">stomach</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2836" class="">stomach</st> is for <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will do <st data-num="2673" class="">away</st> with both.”<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> for <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="1825" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>.

Do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>? Should I <st data-num="142" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> and <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st> them <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> of a <st data-num="4204" class="">prostitute</st>? <st data-num="3361 1096">Never</st>!
Or do you not know that anyone who is united with a prostitute is one body with her? For it is said, “The two will become one flesh.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the one <st data-num="2853" class="">united</st> with<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> with him.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5343" class="">Flee</st> <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>! “<st data-num="3956">Every</st> <st data-num="265" class="">sin</st> a <st data-num="444">person</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">commits</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1622" class="">outside</st> of the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>”<n id="1" />—<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4203" class="">immoral person</st> <st data-num="264" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st>.

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> is the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> of the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1438">your own</st>?
For you were bought at a price. Therefore glorify God with your body.
